009
010package Ch25_SIFT;
011
012import ij.IJ;
013import ij.ImagePlus;
014import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
015import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
016import ij.process.FloatProcessor;
017import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
018import imagingbook.common.color.sets.BasicAwtColor;
019import imagingbook.common.geometry.basic.Pnt2d;
020import imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils;
021import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
022import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ColoredStroke;
023import imagingbook.common.ij.overlay.ShapeOverlayAdapter;
024import imagingbook.common.math.VectorNorm.NormType;
025import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftColors;
026import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDescriptor;
027import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftDetector;
028import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftMatch;
029import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftMatcher;
030import imagingbook.common.sift.SiftParameters;
031import imagingbook.core.plugin.JavaDocHelp;
032import imagingbook.sampleimages.GeneralSampleImage;
033
034import java.awt.Color;
035import java.awt.Font;
036import java.awt.Shape;
037import java.awt.geom.AffineTransform;
038import java.awt.geom.Line2D;
039import java.awt.geom.QuadCurve2D;
040import java.util.List;
041
042import static imagingbook.common.color.sets.ColorEnumeration.getColors;
043import static imagingbook.common.ij.DialogUtils.makeHtmlString;
044import static imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils.noCurrentImage;
045
046/**
047 * <p>
048 * This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the SIFT detection and matching framework. See Sec. 25.5 of [1] for
049 * details.
050 * </p>
051 * <p>
052 * The plugin takes a single image, which is assumed to be composed of a left and right frame. The input image is split
053 * horizontally, then SIFT detection and matching is applied to the two sub-images. The input image is always converted
054 * to grayscale (and normalized to [0,1]) before SIFT feature detection is performed. The result is displayed as a
055 * graphic overlay by connecting and annotating the best-matching features. When saved as a TIFF image the overlay is
056 * preserved.
057 * </p>
058 * <p>
059 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer
060 * (2022).
061 * </p>
062 *
063 * @author WB
064 * @version 2022/11/20
065 */
066public class SIFT_Matching_Demo implements PlugInFilter, JavaDocHelp {
067
068        private static final String HelpText = makeHtmlString(
069                        "This ImageJ plugin demonstrates the use of the SIFT detection and matching framework.",
070                        "The plugin takes a single image, which is assumed to be composed of a left and right frame.",
071                        "The input image is split horizontally, then SIFT detection and matching is applied to the",
072                        "two sub-images. The input image is always converted to grayscale (and normalized to [0,1])",
073                        "before SIFT feature detection is performed. The result is displayed as a graphic overlay by",
074                        "connecting and annotating the best-matching features. When saved as a TIFF image the overlay",
075                        "is preserved."
076        );
077
078        // matching parameters:
079        private static NormType DistanceNormType = SiftMatcher.DefaultNormType;
080        private static double MaxDistanceRatio = SiftMatcher.DefaultRMax;
081
082        // display parameters:
083        private static int NumberOfMatchesToShow = 25;
084        private static double FeatureScale = 1.0;
085        private static boolean ShowFeatureLabels = true;
086
087        private static double MatchLineCurvature = 0.25;
088        private static double FeatureStrokewidth = 1.0;
089
090        private static BasicAwtColor MatchLineColor = BasicAwtColor.Magenta;
091        private static BasicAwtColor LabelColor = BasicAwtColor.Yellow;
092        private static Font LabelFont = new Font(Font.SANS_SERIF, Font.PLAIN, 12);
093        
094        private static Color[] ScaleLevelColors = getColors(SiftColors.class);
095        
096        private ImagePlus im = null;
097
098        /**
099         * Constructor, asks to open a predefined sample image if no other image is currently open.
100         */
101        public SIFT_Matching_Demo() {
102                if (noCurrentImage()) {
103                        DialogUtils.askForSampleImage(GeneralSampleImage.RamsesSmall);
104                }
105        }
106        
107        @Override
108        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
109                this.im = im;
110                return DOES_ALL;
111        }
112
113        @Override
114        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {            
115                if (!runDialog()) {
116                        return;
117                }
118
119                final int w = ip.getWidth();
120                final int h = ip.getHeight();
121                final int w2 = w / 2;
122                
123                FloatProcessor Ia = IjUtils.crop(ip, 0, 0, w2, h).convertToFloatProcessor();
124                FloatProcessor Ib = IjUtils.crop(ip, w2, 0, w2, h).convertToFloatProcessor();
125                
126                SiftParameters siftParams = new SiftParameters();
127                // modify SIFT parameters here if needed
128                
129                // we use the same parameters on left and right image
130                SiftDetector sdA = new SiftDetector(Ia, siftParams);
131                SiftDetector sdB = new SiftDetector(Ib, siftParams);
132                
133                List<SiftDescriptor> fsA = sdA.getSiftFeatures();
134                List<SiftDescriptor> fsB = sdB.getSiftFeatures();
135
136                IJ.log("SIFT features found in left image: "  + fsA.size());
137                IJ.log("SIFT features found in right image: " + fsB.size());
138
139                // create a SIFT matcher and perform matching:
140                SiftMatcher sm = new SiftMatcher(DistanceNormType, MaxDistanceRatio);
141                List<SiftMatch> matches = sm.match(fsA, fsB);   // matches are sorted by decreasing quality
142                
143                IJ.log("Matches found: " + matches.size());
144                if (matches.isEmpty()) {
145                        return;
146                }
147
148                // --------------------------------------------------
149                
150                ColoredStroke matchLineStroke = new ColoredStroke(0.2, MatchLineColor.getColor());
151                ColoredStroke[] fStrokes = new ColoredStroke[ScaleLevelColors.length];
152                for (int i = 0; i < ScaleLevelColors.length; i++) {
153                        fStrokes[i] = new ColoredStroke(FeatureStrokewidth, ScaleLevelColors[i]);
154                }
155                
156                ShapeOverlayAdapter ola = new ShapeOverlayAdapter();
157                ola.setTextColor(LabelColor.getColor());
158                ola.setFont(LabelFont);
159                
160                AffineTransform trans = AffineTransform.getTranslateInstance(w2, 0);
161                
162                // add vertical separator between left and right image:
163                ola.addShape(new Line2D.Double(w2 - 0.5, 0, w2 - 0.5, h), 
164                                new ColoredStroke(0.2, Color.green, 5)); 
165                
166                // add SIFT markers, connecting lines and number labels
167                int n = 1;
168                for (SiftMatch m : matches) {
169                        SiftDescriptor dA = m.getDescriptor1();
170                        SiftDescriptor dB = m.getDescriptor2();
171                        
172                        // draw the matched SIFT markers:
173                        Shape sA = dA.getShape(FeatureScale);
174                        Shape sB = trans.createTransformedShape(dB.getShape(FeatureScale));
175                        ola.addShape(sA, fStrokes[dA.getScaleLevel() % fStrokes.length]);
176                        ola.addShape(sB, fStrokes[dB.getScaleLevel() % fStrokes.length]);
177                        
178                        // draw the connecting lines:
179                        Shape cAB = makeConnectingShape(dA, dB.plus(w2, 0));
180                        ola.addShape(cAB, matchLineStroke);
181                        
182                        // draw the numeric feature labels on both sides:
183                        if (ShowFeatureLabels) {
184                                String label = Integer.toString(n);     
185                                ola.addText(dA.getX(), dA.getY(), label);
186                                ola.addText(dB.getX() + w2, dB.getY(), label);
187                        }
188                        if (++n > NumberOfMatchesToShow) break;
189                }
190
191                im.setOverlay(ola.getOverlay());
192        }
193        
194        // -------------------------
195        
196        private Shape makeConnectingShape(Pnt2d p1, Pnt2d p2) {
197                double x1 = p1.getX(); 
198                double y1 = p1.getY();
199                double x2 = p2.getX(); 
200                double y2 = p2.getY();
201                double dx = x2 - x1;
202                double dy = y2 - y1;
203                double ctrlx = (x1 + x2) / 2 - MatchLineCurvature * dy;
204                double ctrly = (y1 + y2) / 2 + MatchLineCurvature * dx;
205                return new QuadCurve2D.Double(x1, y1, ctrlx, ctrly, x2, y2);
206        }
207        
208        // -------------------------
209        
210        private boolean runDialog() {
211                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
212                gd.addHelp(HelpText);
213                gd.addMessage("This plugin expects a single image composed of a left and right frame.");
214                
215                gd.addMessage("SIFT matching parameters:");
216                gd.addEnumChoice("Distance norm type", DistanceNormType);
217                gd.addNumericField("Max. ratio between 1st/2nd match (rMax)", MaxDistanceRatio, 2);
218                
219                gd.addMessage("Display parameters:");
220                gd.addNumericField("Number of matches to show", NumberOfMatchesToShow, 0);
221                gd.addNumericField("Feature scale", FeatureScale, 2);
222                gd.addNumericField("Match line curvature", MatchLineCurvature, 2);
223                gd.addEnumChoice("Match line color", MatchLineColor);
224                gd.addEnumChoice("Label color", LabelColor);
225                gd.addCheckbox("Show feature labels", ShowFeatureLabels);
226                
227                gd.showDialog();
228                if (gd.wasCanceled()) {
229                        return false;
230                }
231                
232                DistanceNormType = gd.getNextEnumChoice(NormType.class);
233                MaxDistanceRatio = gd.getNextNumber();
234                NumberOfMatchesToShow = (int) gd.getNextNumber();
235                FeatureScale = gd.getNextNumber();
236                MatchLineCurvature = gd.getNextNumber();
237                MatchLineColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
238                LabelColor = gd.getNextEnumChoice(BasicAwtColor.class);
239                ShowFeatureLabels = gd.getNextBoolean();
240                return true;
241        }
242
243}
